project.description: trigger: developer clicks gerrit UI button "DRT" actions: 1. build all boards in "boards2DRT.yml" 2. deploy results to artifactory/sbc-review 2. download and share all results to \\netapp1 folder 3. send DRT request with major version and folder location 4. return the vote to gerrit label "QA"

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CurrentBatchID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: In case you execute manually a DRT that was run and didn't finished, give to this job the batchID - you can find it in the "Environment Variables" of this build

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# send DRT request and keep the serial number from the response: #"BatchId: batchName_636159240296404766_BTR" #REFTARGET=`echo $REFSPEC | sed 's:refs/changes/../::; s:/:-:g'` Change=`echo $REFTARGET | sed 's:-\|\.:_:g'` echo -n "https://artifactory/webapp/#/artifacts/browse/tree/General/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc/DRT/Firmware/$REFTARGET" > artifactory.url
# Can run with major version only: 7.2.150, 7.2.170 GERRIT_BRANCH=$(echo $GERRIT_BRANCH | sed 's:_.*::') if [[ $GERRIT_BRANCH =~ "7.2.2" ]]; then GERRIT_BRANCH=$(echo $GERRIT_BRANCH | sed 's:.$:0:; s:60$:50:') fi
if [ ! -z $CurrentBatchID ]; then echo LinkToPage="---" > generated_drt.properties echo batchID=${CurrentBatchID} >> generated_drt.properties echo url="https://artifactory/webapp/#/artifacts/browse/tree/General/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc/DRT/Firmware/$REFTARGET" >> generated_drt.properties exit 0 fi
#batchID="$(curl -s "http://BatchRunner/AnonymousUser/RunDrtBatch.aspx?ModeType=SBC&CompilationFolder=\\\\netapp1\\cm\\CompilationResults\\DRT\\Firmware\\$REFTARGET&RunByUserEmail=$EMAIL&MajorVersion=$GERRIT_BRANCH" --user qasa:cpelab --ntlm | grep lblBatchIdValue | sed 's/.*Black.>//' | sed 's/<.font>.*//')" Output=$(curl -s "http://BatchRunner/AnonymousUser/RunDrtBatch.aspx?ModeType=SBC&CompilationFolder=\\\\netapp1\\cm\\CompilationResults\\DRT\\Firmware\\$REFTARGET&RunByUserEmail=$EMAIL&MajorVersion=$GERRIT_BRANCH&GerritChange=$Change" --user qasa:cpelab --ntlm | grep -E 'span|class') batchID=`echo $Output | sed 's:.*lblBatchIdValue"><b><font color="Black">::; s:</font.*::'` LinkToPage=`echo $Output | sed 's:.*lblBatchDetailsPathValue"><b><font color="Black">::; s:</font.*::; s:\\\\:/:g'`
echo LinkToPage=${LinkToPage} > generated_drt.properties echo batchID=${batchID} >> generated_drt.properties echo url="https://artifactory/webapp/#/artifacts/browse/tree/General/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc/DRT/Firmware/$REFTARGET" >> generated_drt.properties
if [ "$LinkToPage" == "" ]; then echo $Output | grep 'BatchRunner Is Down' echo "No Batch ID... exit with error" echo Output="No Batch ID" >> generated_drt.properties exit 1; fi
if [[ $Output =~ "Down For Maintenance" ]]; then echo "BatchRunner Is Down For Maintenance... exit with error" echo Output="BatchRunner Is Down For Maintenance" >> generated_drt.properties exit 1; fi
echo Output="Execution error" >> generated_drt.properties

#!/usr/bin/env ruby
require 'json' require 'uri'
unless ENV['CurrentBatchID'].to_s.empty? puts "Executed manually, no need a new message in the Gerrit" exit 0 end
if ENV['REFSPEC'].to_s =~ %r{refs/changes/\d\d/(\d+)/(\d+)$} change=$1 ps=$2 else puts 'Invalid refspec' exit 0 end
data = { message: 'DRT request was sent ' + ENV['BUILD_URL'] + "\n\nDRT status: " + ENV['LinkToPage'], notify: 'NONE', tag: 'autogenerated:drt', }
require 'pp' pp data
system("curl -kn --anyauth -X POST https://test-gerrit/a/changes/#{change}/revisions/#{ps}/review " + "-d '#{data.to_json}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json'")

# check DRT status # "BatchId: DRT_7_2_150_636450404622178009_59399_1_BTR Status: Passed" # Status options: # 1) Passed 2) Failed. 3) UserRequest. 4) WaitingForStations. 5) ConfiguringStations. # 6) Running. 7) Pending. 8) WaitingForStop. 9) Stopped. count=0
for i in {1..5000} do Status="$(curl -s "http://BatchRunner/AnonymousUser/GetDrtBatchStatus.aspx?BtrId=$batchID" --user qasa:cpelab --ntlm | grep lblStatusValue | sed 's/.*Black.>//; s/<.font>.*//')" [ "$Status" == "Passed" ] && exit 0 [ "$Status" == "Failed" -o "$Status" == "WaitingForStop" -o "$Status" == "Stopped" ] && exit 1 [ "$Status" == "" ] && count=$((count+1)) [ $count -eq 50 ] && exit 1 sleep 300s done
echo Exit the while after some days curl -s "http://BatchRunner/AnonymousUser/StopDrtBatch.aspx?BtrId=$batchID" --user qasa:cpelab --ntlm exit 1

for rep in $CHANGES; do
change=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f1` ps=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f2`
#change=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` #ps=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f5` RunPhases=1 checkPS=$ps
#Check if they are not a new PS - if yes, check if the code was changed #In case the code was not changed, give the score to the last PS - should be store in the checkPS variable. ssh -p 29418 -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit query --patch-sets $change | grep 'kind:\|number:' | tail -n +2 | sed 's/ //g' > /tmp/$change.txt # $field Could be: number or kind # $kind could be: REWORK, TRIVIAL_REBASE, MERGE_FIRST_PARENT_UPDATE, NO_CODE_CHANGE or NO_CHANGE while IFS=: read -r field value; do if [ "$field" == "number" ]; then checkPS=$value; else echo Check PS $checkPS: $value; if [[ "$checkPS" -gt "$ps" && "$value" == "REWORK" ]]; then RunPhases=0 fi; fi done < /tmp/$change.txt
if [[ "$RunPhases" -eq 1 ]]; then ps=$checkPS; fi
echo Send OK message to Gerrit - $change,$ps ssh -p 29418 -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit review \ --message "'DRT Passed successfully - $BUILD_URL \ CMP files: $url \ DRT results: $LinkToPage'" \ --notify OWNER \ --label DRT=1 \ --tag "'autogenerated:drt'" \ $change,$ps
done
echo Delete all ELF from Artifacrory User=admin:$Artifact_pass curl -ks -u $User -X DELETE https://artifactory/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc/DRT/Firmware/$REFTARGET/map

for rep in $CHANGES; do
change=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f1` ps=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f2`
echo Send failed message to Gerrit - $change,$ps ssh -p 29418 -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit review \ --message "'DRT Failed - $BUILD_URL \ CMP files: $url \ Error message: $Output \ DRT results: $LinkToPage'" \ --notify OWNER \ --label DRT=-1 \ --tag "'autogenerated:drt'" \ $change,$ps
done

echo ----------------- Stop it after it was aborted -------------------- curl -s "http://BatchRunner/AnonymousUser/StopDrtBatch.aspx?BtrId=$batchID" --user qasa:cpelab --ntlm echo ----------------- Done ------------------------
for rep in $CHANGES; do
change=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f1` ps=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f2`
ssh -p 29418 -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit review \ --message "'DRT was aborted'" \ --notify OWNER \ --tag "'autogenerated:drt'" \ $change,$ps
done
